message: The SDG_SERIES_DESCR field for indicator 2-c-1, translated into all languages

data.en:
Indicator of Food Price Anomalies (IFPA), by type of product

Indicator of Food Price Anomalies (IFPA), by Consumer Food Price Index

Proportion of countries recording abnormally high or moderately high food prices, according to the Indicator of Food Price Anomalies (%)
data.fr:
Indicateur des anomalies des prix alimentaires (IAPA), selon le type de produit

Indicateur des anomalies des prix alimentaires (IAPA), selon l’indice des prix des aliments à la consommation
